'''Zulka''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|A woman strides into the tavern, bearing a staff whose ornamental head glows with arcane energy. 
She strikes the staff upon the ground, once, and the tavern fills with eerie light as the runes carved upon each vessel's forehead begin to glow.}}

Zulka is one of [Menzzago](/menzzago/)'s fampyrs, a so called "protector" of the Splintered Reef, she is responsible for delivering fresh meat to its "citizens".

}}

## =Quests

=
* [A Paradise of the Mind](/aParadiseOfTheMind/): Zulka is confronted shortly after the quest begins.

{{Description|A woman strides into the tavern, bearing a staff whose ornamental head glows with arcane energy.
